div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1101 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1948 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 36 AE. In one room in agora Maced.: 1 AE (as SNGCop. 1119-36) Olbia: 4 fish-shaped AE 21 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 8 [1], 10-11 [2], 13-14 [2], 20 [1], 23 [1], 26-29 [14]) 2 AE flans Cercinitis: 1 AE (as Zograph, pl. 38, 17 [but with ΙΣΤΙ]) Unc.: 7 AE Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
